author: ceki
msg: Since log4j components can use log4j itself to log messages, and since ErrorHandler code was used to log
one and only one message, it is cleaner to have Appender implementation be responsible for their error conditions.
- Removed the various DateFormat classes in o.a.l.helpers. Referent classes have been updated.

author: ceki
msg: Removed o.a.l.jdbc. It had been deprecated for a long time.

msg: Making SocketAppender to the log4j internal logging guidelines.
